divs: Sighting DetailsMother's day outing, Sunday May 12, 2013. Took many panoramic photographs during the day (70+). Stopped to take a few photographs of my wife and of the view overlooking Long Island Sound towards Ct. After I downloaded the photographs, I observed three objects in the clouds above the water. In another photograph, a very obvious object that is not in the clouds and appears to be flying above the water. It appears to be black in color, and radiating or giving off some type of heat or force around the vessel. If you examine the photos, you can see people walking and the object is in the first photo and not in the second taken but a few seconds apart.
Summary: Total of four UFOs in two photographs. Three cigar shapes in clouds, one teardrop shape in photo approximately 70-100 feet above water. All invisible to the naked eye.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around May 12th 2013
